ski_lls: Float (floating point numbers - also called double)
common_string: strlen() - Returns the length of a string.
strpos() - Finds the position of the first occurrence of a substring in a string.
str_replace() - Replaces all occurrences of a search string with a replacement string.
substr() - Returns a portion of a string.
trim() - Strips whitespace (or other characters) from the beginning and end of a string.
strtolower() - Converts all characters in a string to lowercase.
strtoupper() - Converts all characters in a string to uppercase.
explode() - Splits a string into an array by a specified delimiter.
implode() - Joins array elements into a single string using a delimiter
htmlspecialchars() - Converts special characters to HTML entities.
md5() - Calculates the MD5 hash of a string.
sha1() - Calculates the SHA-1 hash of a string.
strrev() - Reverses a string.
nl2br() - Inserts HTML line breaks before all newlines in a string.
strcmp() - Compares two strings (case-sensitive).
strcasecmp() - Compares two strings (case-insensitive).
stristr() - Finds the first occurrence of a string inside another string (case-insensitive).
str_repeat() - Repeats a string a specified number of times.
ucfirst() - Converts the first character of a string to uppercase.
ucwords() - Converts the first character of each word in a string to uppercase.
addslashes() - Adds backslashes before characters that need to be escaped.
strip_tags() - Strips HTML and PHP tags from a string.
strstr() - Finds the first occurrence of a string within another string.
wordwrap() - Wraps a string to a given number of characters.
parse_str() - Parses a query string into variables.
